title: Database Schema Design
description: Design normalized, scalable database schemas with indexing strategy
prompt:
Design a comprehensive database schema for [DESCRIPTION]:

Requirements:
[LIST YOUR REQUIREMENTS]

Please Provide:
1. Entity-Relationship Diagram
2. Complete CREATE TABLE statements
3. Primary and foreign keys
4. Indexing strategy with rationale
5. Normalization analysis
6. Sample queries
7. Scalability considerations
8. Migration strategy
example: Design a database schema for an e-commerce platform
